SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
OfflineGameController, OnlineGameController
public abstract class GameController extends Object
Class used to control the game by manipulating the model. It contains the game instance, the player iterator and the bot instance and acts as an interface to the model by exposing only certain Game class functionalities
See Also:

  • PlayerIterator
  • Bot

    • placeCard

      public List<Card> placeCard(Card card)
      Method that places the card on the board, gives taken cards to the team and removes the card from currentPlayer
      Parameters:
      card - played card
      Returns:
      state of table after placement

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by initializing the Game instance, the PlayerIterator and the Bot. The Bot is set by default at the hardest difficulty

    • setBotDifficulty

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws EndGameException
      Progress the match by one turn by updating the current player
      Throws:
      EndGameException - if the player iterator made enough round (Game.N_OF_TURNS rounds) throws the exception to signal to the caller that the game is over

    • endGame

      public GameResult[] endGame()
      Ends the game by generating and returning the end game results and by rotating the list of player: in this way an eventual next turn would start from another player
      Returns:
      two GameResult instances
